TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: To friends returning from the Orbital Probe Cannon: I have have decided to try to run more launches with the alternate power source.
CASSAVA: It is.. all I can think to do right now. Please be welcomed to join me, if you would like.
DAZ: My love! I heard Oeno is having trouble with stowaways within the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> who have become too accustomed to the space - they keep eluding her attempts to release them!
DAZ: I'm sure she would like as many pairs of eyes as possible to help catch and release them.. Would you like to join us?
CASSAVA: Please assist them in my stead, my love. A change of task is.. not what I need at this moment.
